reviewTitle: Battery performance very poor, Sound good but No bass
reviewDescription: The seller said that its battery lasts for 6 hours but it gets down in just half an hourThere is no option given for return and replacementUpdate:- Amazon customer care first advised me to take the battery to the company's service center which is 200km away, to which I objected and asked them to tell me what Amazon's return and refund policy is? After that the customer care person made me talk to his senior officer.I just told him that if I have to go to the service center then why should I buy the product from Amazon, I should have bought it offline in the market.The senior officer understood my issue and immediately started my return and refund process, I got my refund within 5 minutes of picking up the product

This pTron Fusion Quad V2 Speaker is an absolute game-changer! The powerful 40W sound output fills any room with rich, immersive audio. The vibrant RGB lighting adds a party atmosphere, and the included wired microphone makes it perfect for karaoke nights.The Bluetooth 5.1 connectivity ensures a stable and strong wireless connection, while the multiple playback options offer flexibility. The TWS feature allows you to pair two speakers for an even more powerful sound experience.The battery life is impressive, providing hours of non-stop music. The sleek design and convenient controls make it easy to use and transport.If you're looking for a portable speaker that delivers exceptional sound and features, this is the one!

I recently tried this speaker with a corded microphone, and while it has some good features, there are notable issues with its battery performance when using the mic. The speaker claims a 6-hour playback time, but that only applies when using an SD card—Bluetooth and microphone use drain the battery much faster. Unfortunately, when using the mic, the battery lasts less than an hour.Additionally, if you try to use the mic while the speaker is plugged in for charging, you’ll still face issues. It seems the device’s charging speed is slower than its power consumption rate when the mic is in use. This means that even while charging, the battery drains, leading to a subpar experience.If you are considering this speaker primarily for its microphone functionality, this product may fall short of expectations. Apart from the mic issues, the speaker is an okay product, but not something I would recommend for reliable mic use.

Its powerful bass and clear vocals make it ideal for karaoke sessions, adding a lively atmosphere to any gathering. This speaker stands out due to its ease of connectivity with Bluetooth, AUX, and USB options, providing flexibility for users. The long-lasting battery life ensures hours of uninterrupted fun, making it a top pick for both indoor and outdoor events.
